short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to help you automatically import products from cjdropshipping into your opencart store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your dropshipping workflow with the CJDropShipping OpenCart and VentoCart, Importer Chrome extension. This powerful tool seamlessly integrates CJDropShipping with your OpenCart store, allowing you to import products effortlessly.

*** This extension is designed for users who have already installed the CJDropShipping-OpenCart extension, either directly from within the OpenCart platform or through the marketplace.

How It Works:
    
    Install the Extension:
    Install the CJDropShipping OpenCart Importer extension on your Chrome browser.

    Install on OpenCart:
    Install the corresponding OpenCart module to enable seamless communication between your browser and your OpenCart store.

    Browse CJDropShipping:
    Visit CJDropShipping and explore their extensive product catalog. In the product menu (e.g., "add to cart," etc.), a new button, "Add to OpenCart," will appear.

    Click "Add to OpenCart":
    Simply click the "Add to OpenCart" button for any product you want to import. The extension will handle the rest.

    Manage Imports in OpenCart Admin Panel:
    Navigate back to your OpenCart admin panel and access the CJDropShipping Importer. There, you'll find a collection of all the products you added from your browser to the import list.

Key Features:

    Effortless Import:
    Add products to your OpenCart store with a single click, directly from CJDropShipping.

    Centralized Management:
    Easily manage all imported products in one dedicated section within your OpenCart admin panel.

    Customization Options:
    Customize product details as needed, ensuring consistency with your store's branding.

Compatibility:

    OpenCart 4
    VentoCart
